_header: Let no man come into this hall
_description: A carol of Christmas sports — three quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Make we mery bothe more & lasse / ffor now ys þe tyme of crystymas’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Lett no man cum in to this hallGrome page nor yet
                    marshall…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…But to the stokkis then let hym goFor now ys ys
                    þe tyme of crystmasExplicit
